rootCause: Self-check strictly parsed fixed column positions from avahi-browse output, causing misses when optional address fields were present or re-ordered. As a result, valid adverts were treated as missing on some Avahi builds.
resolution: Anchor parsing on the service type token and compute relative indices for instance/host/port. Accept both FQDN and short host variants and gate relaxed retry strictly on IPv4 mismatch exit code.
